resources.string:
VPay is a technology demonstrator app that shows that voice powered conversational AI can enable users to speak to their apps to make payments using the UPI interface. 

We hope you like it. If yes, let us know. If you don't, tell us but politely ЁЯШЙ

The SlangDunk Team
\"I want to send money to Satish\"
